name: Vahid Mansuri
summary: Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable applications using .NET Core, Angular, and cloud technologies. Expertise in microservices architecture, AI integration, and DevOps pipelines with proven track record at Hansen Tech, NCS Group, and Capgemini.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Working as a Full Stack Developer on Catalog Hansen Product, a telco-service provider platform. Utilizing Core Concepts, REST APIs, Open APIs and KAFKA events to enable seamless transmission, proficient in AWS Services, Helm Deployment and Azure pipelines for streamline development. Aligning test framework to use Spec Flow BDD and enhancing the user experience. Managed Kubernetes clusters with Helm and integrated identity management via Okta. Actively developing Grace AI and transforming it into an agentic AI through integration with MCP server.

experience.title: Associate Engineer
experience.description: Worked as a Full Stack Developer on IRIN P3 Tax System of Singapore. Worked on Financial Account Management module, understanding Tax Terms and Financial components. Extensively working with Microservice architecture collaborated with cross platform user interface. Applied .NET Core, Kafka and NgRX to streamline financial workflows, led Azure DevOps based CI/CD pipelines to accelerate deployment cycles.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Enhanced 5G-SA-L3 product to implement various features like XNHO Cell to Cell Handover and CAG for improving network. Utilized Google Test and NUnit to ensure robust network performance. Developed a Performance Improver Automation tool for creating various setups and simulators using C Sharp.

experience.title: Internship Trainee
experience.description: Designed a full duplex Smart Home automation tool to automate home appliances, created a Raspberry Pi based server application which can communicate to IoT devices through an Android APK to control everything remotely over Wi-Fi. Used Web Socket concepts for live sharing among the devices.

education.coursework: Data Structures, Design and analysis of Algorithms, Database Systems, Operating Systems, Software Engineering and interpersonal skills

items: Azure (AZDO, Function, App Insight, Blob Storage)

highlights.title: Agentic AI Development
highlights.description: Actively developing Grace AI and transforming it into an agentic AI through integration with MCP server at Hansen Tech

highlights.description: Enhanced 5G-SA-L3 product with features like XNHO Cell to Cell Handover and CAG for improving network performance at Capgemini

highlights.description: Designed a full duplex Smart Home automation tool with Raspberry Pi server and Android APK for remote IoT control via WebSocket

highlights.title: Tax System Development
highlights.description: Developed Financial Account Management module for IRIN P3 Tax System of Singapore using .NET Core and Kafka microservices

highlights.title: Kubernetes & Helm Management
highlights.description: Managed Kubernetes clusters with Helm and integrated identity management via Okta at Hansen Tech

highlights.title: SQL Data Modeler Tool
highlights.description: Created a desktop application framework similar to Toad Data Modeler that generates SQL scripts with drag-and-drop interface using AJAX

highlights.title: Azure & AWS Cloud Integration
highlights.description: Proficient in Azure DevOps pipelines, Azure Functions, App Insights, and AWS services including S3, RDS, and Bedrock for AI integration

highlights.title: Awards & Recognition
highlights.description: Received Spot Awards at NCS and Salute Success awards at Hansen Tech; District Top Rank in SSC and HSC

highlights.title: Scrum Master
highlights.description: Served as Scrum Master on a rotating basis and active member of International Lions Club
